thread.title: 5 fast food combos more outrageous than a McWhopper
thread.title_full: 5 fast food combos more outrageous than a McWhopper - MarketWatch

author: Sally French   and   Terrence Horan
title: 5 fast food combos more outrageous than a McWhopper
text:
MarketWatch photo illustration/McDonald Slide 1 of 7 Burger King is offering a peace treaty to its fast food burger rival McDonald’s. In a full-page newspaper ad Wednesday, Burger King proposed the two companies make a mashup of their staple burgers - the Whopper and the Big Mac - to create an all new creation called the “McWhopper.”
It’s unclear whether McDonald’s will agree to Burger King’s proposal, but if it did, the creation probably wouldn’t look all that different from what the fast-food restaurants already sell -- as evidenced by this MarketWatch photo illustration.
And MarketWatch’s food writer Charles Passy tested his own version of a McWhopper -- and his verdict was that the burger has potential to be quite tasty.
But you know what might taste even better than a McWhopper? Try these crazy food combos:
MarketWatch photo illustration/Bloomberg A chicken burrito bowl is seen at the Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc. restaurant in Foster City, California. Slide 2 of 7 Chipotle Burrito Bowl + Five Guys Hamburger = Burger Bowl
MarketWatch photo illustration Slide 3 of 7 Taco Bell Crunchy Taco + Captain D’s Batter Dipped Fish = Fish tacos
MarketWatch photo illustration/McDonald Slide 4 of 7 McDonald’s Egg McMuffin + Popeyes Buttermilk Biscuits = Egg McBiscuits
MarketWatch photo illustration/McDonald Slide 5 of 7 McDonald’s Filet-O-Fish + Red Lobster Cheddar Bay Biscuits = Cheddar Bay Filet
MarketWatch photo illustration/Olive Garden, Shutterstock Slide 6 of 7 Nathan’sWorld Famous Beef Hot Dog + Olive Garden Breadsticks
MarketWatch photo illustration/Olive Garden, Shutterstock Slide 7 of 7 Nathan’sWorld Famous Beef Hot Dog + Olive Garden Breadsticks
